results.title: Simvastatin inhibits induction of matrix metalloproteinase-9 in rat alveolar macrophages exposed to cigarette smoke extract.
results.text_hl: We previously reported that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, an inhibitor of @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_25675 @@@HMG-CoA reductase@@@, attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Emphysematous_Cholecystitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D041882 @@@emphysematous change@@@ and @GENE_MMP9 @GENE_81687 @@@MMP-9@@@ induction in the lungs of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ exposed to cigarette smoke.

citations.NLM: Kim SE, Thanh Thuy TT, Lee JH, Ro JY, Bae YA, Kong Y, Ahn JY, Lee DS, Oh YM, Lee SD, Lee YS. Simvastatin inhibits induction of matrix metalloproteinase-9 in rat alveolar macrophages exposed to cigarette smoke extract. Exp Mol Med. 2009 Apr 30;41(4):277-87. PMID: 19299917
